message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm willing to throw in a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to offer any further discounts. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying at this price. I'd like to see the next product.
